channel.title: Toronto International Film Festival on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Toronto Film Festival Reconsiders Premiering Israeli Oct. 7 Doc After Pulling Invite
item.description: TIFF CEO Cameron Bailey said he’s “committed to working with the filmmaker to meet TIFF’s screening requirements to allow the film to be screened at this year’s festival.”

item.title: Toronto Film Festival Reconsiders Premiering Israeli Oct. 7 Doc After Pulling Invite
item.description: TIFF CEO Cameron Bailey said he’s “committed to working with the filmmaker to meet TIFF’s screening requirements to allow the film to be screened at this year’s festival.”

item.title: Elizabeth Olsen Chooses Between an Afterlife With Miles Teller or Callum Turner in A24’s ‘Eternity’ Trailer
item.description: Da’Vine Joy Randolph and John Early also star in the romantic comedy that premieres at TIFF.
